definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: A quality control method was established for identification and determination of artificial Cow-Bezoar in Houjiling Tablets.
sentences.chinese: 建立喉疾灵片中人工牛黄的质量控制方法。

sentences.english: The active oxygen radicals of cultured bezoar have been studied by chemiluminescence.
sentences.chinese: 运用化学发光技术研究了培植牛黄的活性氧自由基。

sentences.english: Calculus bovis has wide use and is an important raw material in Chinese patent medicine.
sentences.chinese: 牛黄用途广泛，是中成药的重要原料。

sentences.english: The methods can effectively control the quality of Calculus Bovis in Houzao Niuhuang Powder.
sentences.chinese: 所建立的方法能有效地控制猴枣牛黄散中牛黄的质量。

sentences.english: The methods can effectively control the quality of Calculus Bovis in Houzao Niuhuang Powder.
sentences.chinese: 所建立的方法能有效地控制猴枣牛黄散中牛黄的质量。

definition: Chinese goldthread (Coptis chinensis), rhizome used in medicine
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
croton (Croton tiglium), evergreen bush of Euphorbiaceae family 大戟科[da4 ji3 ke1]/croton seed, a strong purgative
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
